==Trivia==
* <section begin="ShogunTheme" /> The soundtracks ''Separated Dream'', ''In the Strange Realm of Sakura'', ''The Sealed Harbor'', ''Island for Outlanders'', ''Dream of Homeland'',  ''Interwoven Nostalgia'', ''Preparation of Matsuri'', ''Awake From a Nightmare'', ''Termination of Desires'', ''Thunderings of the Merciless'', and ''The Almighty Violet Thunder'' all share the same theme.
** This theme was referred to as the Electro Archon's theme. According to music director Jinhan "Zoe" Cai, it was inspired by the Japanese folk song ''{{w|Sakura Sakura}}''.<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/avmFhel0ky4 "Travelers' Musings" &mdash; Behind the Scenes of the Music of Inazuma] (Timestamp: 1m 9s)</ref><section end="ShogunTheme" />
* ''Separated Dream'' was featured in the rhythm game-based event [[Tuned to the World's Sounds]] from [[Version 2.2]]. During the event, the player is paired with the character [[Raiden Shogun]] for this song.
